document.full_text: anne mansouret, a prominent member of the party who originally dissuaded her daughter from filing a complaint against dominique strauss-kahn in 2002, is now talking about the incident.
document.title: french socialists may expel member speaking out on strauss-kahn
lines_and_colors: anne mansouret, a prominent member of the party who originally dissuaded her daughter from filing a complaint against dominique strauss-kahn in 2002, is now talking about the incident.
